actions: Tonifies Qi and Blood, tonifies Wei Qi, stabilizes the Exterior, promotes urination, reduces edema and relieves numbness and pain.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing.
Unblocks the channels and collaterals, disperses clumps, cools Blood Heat to reduce swelling and alleviates pain.
With Gan Cao, for numbness and paralysis of the extremities.
Extinguishes Wind, stops tremors and convulsions, tracks down Wind, unblocks the collaterals and stops pain.
Invigorates and tonifies the Blood, activates the channels and relaxes the sinews.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates spasms and alleviates pain.

syndromes: Wind-Cold-Damp with Blood Deficiency and Blood Stasis

symptoms: Pain in the trunk and extremities
